articles.title: ‘Sextortion’ Scams Involving Apple Messages Ended in Tragedy for These Boys
articles.content: Criminals exploit the trust teens have in iPhone messaging, and use the platform to make relentless demands for money.

articles.title: Here's How Much Traders Expect Apple Stock to Move After WWDC
articles.content: Current options pricing suggests markets expect a modest move in the tech giant's stock price the week of its annual Worldwide Developers Conference, with the keynote scheduled for Monday.

articles.title: QQA: New Option Strategy ETF In The Nasdaq 100
articles.content: QQA offers an 8.63% yield from option strategies in the Nasdaq 100 and its track record shows a total return nearly matching QQQ. Read more on QQA's potential vs. its peers.

articles.title: GameStop, Oracle Headline Earnings Next Week As Investors Eye Trade Talks, Inflation Data, WWDC25
articles.content: GameStop, Oracle will report earnings next week. In focus will be trade talks, inflation data and Apple's WWDC event. See more updates here.

articles.title: Pomerantz Law Firm Investigates Claims On Behalf of Investors of Apple Inc. - AAPL
articles.content: NEW YORK, June 7, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Pomerantz LLP is investigating claims on behalf of investors of Apple Inc.  . Such investors are advised to contact Danielle Peyton at...

articles.title: APLY As A Tactical Reduced Risk Play On Apple
articles.content: Reduce risk while maintaining upside with covered calls on Apple, especially after a prolonged bull run. Find out how APLY is more about balancing growth with defensiveness.

articles.title: 47.7% of Warren Buffett's $282 Billion Portfolio Is Invested in 3 Stocks That Could Net Berkshire Hathaway $1.6 Billion in Dividends This Year
articles.content: Buffett likes investing in companies that return money to shareholders through dividends, because they compound his returns more quickly.  Three of Berkshire's holdings, which represent almost half of the value of its portfolio, could deliver $1.6 billion in dividend payments this year.  Warren Buffett has been the CEO of the Berkshire Hathaway holding company since 1965.

articles.title: WWDC25: Here’s everything Apple is likely to announce
articles.content: A glass-like user interface, Mac-like iPads, AI-boosted battery management, Gemini at the ready, and more: What to expect at Apple’s big event on Monday.

articles.title: GameStop earnings, US-China talks, May CPI: What to Watch
articles.content: Market Domination Overtime hosts Julie Hyman and Josh Lipton preview the top market stories and headlines Wall Street will be paying attention to next week, including corporate earnings from companies like GameStop (GME), Oracle (ORCL), Adobe (ADBE), and the J.M. Smucker Company (SJM); Apple's (AAPL) 2025 Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) kicking off; May's inflation data; and the launch of Tesla's (TSLA) robotaxi beta in Austin, Texas, starting on June 12. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here.
